title: Educational Digital Game Design Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental game literacy and intermediate-level domain knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Game design education for strengthening social domain job competencies in smartphone-based offline environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze gamification elements in digital games and design game mechanics aligned with educational objectives.
Learners can develop educational mini-game prototypes reflecting vocational scenarios in social studies.
Learners experience iterative improvement of game design proposals through peer feedback.

resources: Low-Spec Game Development Tools (e.g., Flowlab, Construct 3 Lite)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
